relation: Invoke callbacks from other native threads
An actor model library, inspired by Erlang
An enhancement for srfi-18 that connects a mailbox to each thread.
Enable mailbox-threads to be used across processes.
textBeforeTable: Language extensions Unsupported or redundant Uncategorized or invalid category Concurrency and parallelism Miscellaneous Macros and meta-syntax Code generation User interface toolkits Cryptography Unit-testing Sound Tools Data formats and parsing Algorithms and data-structures Object-oriented programming Mathematical libraries Egg tools Documentation tools XML processing Web programming Interfacing to other languages OS interface Databases Input/Output Networking Logic programming Debugging tools Graphics Language extensions Categories List of available eggs  chicken-install -help For more information, enter  chicken-install -retrieve EXTENSIONNAME If you only want to download the extension source code, pass the -retrieve option to chicken-install:  csi -p "(repository-path)" You can obtain the repository location by running This will download anything needed to compile and install the library. If your extension repository is placed at a location for which you don't have write permissions, then run chicken-install with the -sudo option or run it as root (not recommended).  chicken-install EXTENSIONNAME Just enter Installation A library of extensions for the CHICKEN Scheme system.
